Equate Hydrating Facial Cleanser

Brand: Equate

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: WATER (AQUA), GLYCERIN, STEARYL ALCOHOL, PEG-100 STEARATE, GLYCERYL STEARATE, CETYL ALCOHOL, POTASSIUM PHOSPHATE, CERAMIDE NP, CERAMIDE AP, CERAMIDE EOP, CARBOMER, XANTHAN GUM, PHYTOSPHINGOSINE, CHOLESTEROL, SODIUM LAUROYL LACTYLATE, BEHENTRIMONIUM METHOSULFATE, TOCOPHEROL, DISODIUM EDTA, PHENOXYETH- ANOL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, SODIUM

AP, CERAMIDE EOP, CARBOMER, XANTHAN GUM, PHYTOSPHINGOSINE, CHOLESTEROL, SODIUM LAUROYL LACTYLATE, BEHENTRIMONIUM METHOSULFATE, TOCOPHEROL, DISODIUM EDTA, PHENOXYETH- ANOL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, SODIUM HYDROXIDE.
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
